Box 208285 New Haven, CT 06520 About Alex Wong Degrees Ph.D., University of California, Los Angeles M.S., University of California, Los Angeles B.S., University of California, Los Angeles Perspectives Sensor fusion; unsupervised learning; 3D vision; robust vision under adverse conditions; medical image analysis.
